definitions.title: n.pr.loc.
definitions.body: (strictly pl. of foreg.; prob. = circles of stones, Vulgate tumuli, cf. Di)
Jos 18:17 (cf. [[הַגִּלְגׇּל]] Jos 15:7), place on border between Benj. & Judah.

definitions.title: a.
definitions.body: [[הַיַּרְדֵּן אֲשֶׁר בְּאֶרֶץ כְּנׇ֑עַן]] ´[[אֶל־ג]] Jos 22:10 unto Geliloth (= the circles) of Jordan which is in the land of Canaan; (LXX Galgala, LXXL Galilwq).

definitions.title: b.
definitions.body: [[אֶל־מוּל אֶרֶץ כְּנַעַן אֶל־גְּלִילוֹת]] [[הַיַּרְדֵּן אֶל־עֵבֶר בְּנֵי יִשְׂרָאֵל]] v:Jos 22:11 in front of the land of Canaan, in Geliloth of Jordan, beyond the sons of Israel (LXX Galaad, LXXL om.) v. Di; yet cf. Dr:Intr. 106 n. Others render ´[[ג]] here circuit of Jordan = [[כִּכַּר הַיַּרְדֵּן]]; districts VB, cf. [[גְּלִילָה]].
